transcript:
so at the beginning we seek particular
things and we get some amount of
happiness for some amount of time but
it's never enough right we see this a
lot with the content creators that we
work with I have 100,000 subscribers oh
my God go you are you happy now no I
need 200,000 are you happy with 200,000
no this person they just came on the
scene and they've been streaming for 6
months I've been streaming for 2 years
and they have 180,000 and I have 200,000
I even have more than them but I'm still
unhappy so this is the problem with
fulfilling desires and chasing your
wants is that it's never enough it is
the nature of a want to be temporary and
the satisfaction of a want to be
temporary how long does the happiness
from the perfect wedding last we have
all these Bridezillas and groom zillas
now right I want this I want this I want
this and even though you ruin all your
relationships and you go into debt to
get your perfect wedding what happens a
month later 6 months later so wants are
temporary
